title: DataConfig
description: Configuration for data binding and state management within UI components, defining data sources, transformation pipelines, and update triggers. Manages component data flow.

source.description: Data origin for this binding configuration.

target.description: SpecNodeId of the destination element receiving bound data (e.g., a data-model entity ID or API endpoint ID). Use relationships to formally link to those layers.

path.description: Dot-notation or JSONPath expression selecting a field within the source data (e.g., 'user.profile.name' or '$.items[0].id').
